title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year
Per capita consumption in pounds is gradually constant from 2000 to 2004, slightly decreasing from 2004 to 2005, and lastly rapidly constant from 2005 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Max Per capita consumption in pounds about 5.1 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Per capita consumption in pounds about 2.61 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2000 to 2005.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2005 to 2008.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
